node.display_long_description:
Contractors VR is a military competitive multiplayer shooter VR game, experience a next-level VR battlefield with intense firefights, coop missions, lethal weapons, and customizable loadout. 
Features include: 
1. Casual and competitive game modes. 
2. Intense offline and online co-op missions. 
3. Over 30 different weapons to choose from. 
4. Customizable loadout system. 
5. Cross-play across Quest and Rift platforms.
6. Target practice hub area.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Patch 0.81.1

* WW2 Weapon reload fix for Kar98 and Mosin-Nagant.
* UI input issue fix.
* Competitive server display fix.
* Quest WW2 free roam mode optimization.
* Fixed melee weapon and gadgets disappearing after putting back to holster.

nodes.title: Contractors v0.81.0 Update (WW|| Weapon Loadout Available)
nodes.body_text:
Contractors Patch 0.81.0 Is Here!

What's new:
WWII Loadout is now officially available.
Added Mini Map for all maps and modes
Winter Theme for HQ map.
Improved Coop AI behavior. AI become more lethal and spawn less often.

Fixes:
Fixed competitive server tag.
Improved weapon sounds.
Fixed suppressor sound on Quest.
Fixed Training Mission 3 and 4.
Fixed Gunstock Calibration weapon UI not displayed when first open.

Have a Happy Holiday/New Year!

nodes.title: Ver.0.80.1 Quick Patch (NameTag; Weapon Sound; Quest 2 Resolution Bump)
nodes.body_text:
Ver 0.80.1 Patch Note:

Bug Fix: Fixed Friendly NameTag not displaying sooner
Bug Fix: Fixed Weapon sounds not being clearly sptialized.
Bug Fix: Fixed infinite sound loop in HQ.
Bug Fix: Fixed mp5 is missing from gunstock calibration menu.
Bug Fix: Fixed weapons are not displayed at high LOD during gunstock calibration.
Bug Fix: Fixed holding mp7 left handed will damage player while firing weapon.
Improvement: Improved overall audio quality.
Improvement: EOtech Lense crosshair become sharper.
Improvement: Quest2 resolution have been increased.
Improvement: Quest2 will display higher quality model for AI/Bots.
Added an option to switch weapon clip grab button.

- We noticed some players are unable to update game to the newest version, we suggest uninstall the game first and reinstall it. We are sorry for the inconvience.

node.reviewDescription:
Pros: 
-compared to its competitors, graphics are nice
-sound of each weapon is amazing
-reloading is realistic and you have to be in contact with the reload points on the weapon
-games are fast and hectic and addicting
-imagine COD but in vr
-setting up coop or public lobbies is easy peasy
-loadouts are streamlined and easy to make on the fly
-ww2 load outs which are unique all on its own
-maps are perfectly sized for the player amount
-diverse game modes

Cons:
-even after tutorials it takes a little bit to get used to controls
-wish there were more open lobbies
-not really the games fault but there's lobbies where children like stay in the hub world only and kick people who don't wanna play tag and Simon says 🤔 
-the occasional toxic player but I mean where aren't you gonna find those 

Overall I say just get it, don't wait just buy it now. I've played hours and hours and it just doesn't get boring, keeps you up and moving as well! Plus I've met some cool people in games too!

website_page_meta.description: Contractors is a fast-paced military shooter game, with online competitive game modes and coop missions.
website_page_meta.title: Contractors · Oculus Quest
